definitions.definition: An impediment to walking due to the feet or legs.
examples: His lameness may have prevented him from walking but it didn't stop him from running for public office.

definitions.definition: The quality of being lame , pathetic or uncool .
examples: I can't believe the lameness of the special effects in that movie.

main_definition: An impediment to walking due to the feet or legs.
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) The quality of being lame , pathetic or uncool .
